scripts.dev:prod: npm run decrypt-production-env && npm run dev
scripts.dev:staging: npm run decrypt-staging-env && npm run dev
scripts.build:prod: npm run decrypt-production-env && next build && npm run build-sitemap
scripts.build:staging: npm run decrypt-staging-env && next build && npm run build-sitemap
scripts.setup-encryption: npm run encrypt-production-env && npm run encrypt-staging-env && npm run encrypt-dev-env
scripts.create-encryption-keys: touch .env.local && cm-env setup prod && cm-env setup staging && cm-env setup dev && npm run setup-encryption
scripts.test-all: npm run lint && npm run build:staging --debug
